description: Image and deconvolve a measurement set (MS)

parameters.info: MS to be imaged and/or deconvolved
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Prefix for output images. If not specified, will use the basename of MS.
parameters.name: prefix

parameters.info: Column to be imaged. Note that you can only make a clean (or restored) image from the CORRECTED_DATA column
parameters.name: column

parameters.info: Image size in pixels
parameters.name: npix

parameters.info: Size of a pixel in arcsec. But can also be specified as '2arcsec/2armnin etc.
parameters.name: cellsize

parameters.info: Visibility weighting mode
parameters.name: weight

parameters.info: Briggs robustness parameter
parameters.name: robust

parameters.info: Name of prior image file
parameters.name: prior

parameters.info: Imaging mode
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Apply gaussian tapering filter; specify as major,minor,pa
parameters.name: filter

parameters.info: Specify clean restoring beam; specify as major axis,minor axis,position angle with unitsi
parameters.name: clean_beam

parameters.info: Field of view size for uniform/briggs weighting, if different from image size
parameters.name: weight_fov

parameters.info: Noise (in Jy) for briggsabs weightingfloat
parameters.name: noise

parameters.info: if >0 specifies nr of convolution functions to use in W-projection
parameters.name: wprojplanes

parameters.info: padding factor in image plane (>=1.0)
parameters.name: padding

parameters.info: Maximum size of gridding cache (in MB)
parameters.name: cachesize

parameters.info: Stokes parameters to image
parameters.name: stokes

parameters.info: Number of facets in x or y
parameters.name: nfacets

parameters.info: Phase center to be used (e.g. 'j2000,05h30m,-30.2deg')
parameters.name: phasecenter

parameters.info: Field ID
parameters.name: field-id

parameters.info: Spectral window ID(s)
parameters.name: spw-id

parameters.info: Frequency channel mode
parameters.name: chanmode

parameters.info: number of frequency channels to select from each spectral window (one number per spw). Comma separated string
parameters.name: nchan

parameters.info: First frequency channel per each spw (0-relative). Comma separated string
parameters.name: chanstart

parameters.info: fre`iquency channel step per each spw. Comma separated string
parameters.name: chanstep

parameters.info: Number of frequency channels in image
parameters.name: img_nchan

parameters.info: first frequency channel in image (0-relative)
parameters.name: img_chanstart

parameters.info: frequency channel step in image
parameters.name: img_chanstep

parameters.info: UV range filter for MS
parameters.name: uvrange

parameters.info: TaQL selection string for MS
parameters.name: select

parameters.info: Operation
parameters.name: operation

parameters.info: Number of clean iterations
parameters.name: clean_iterations

parameters.info: Loop gain for cleaning
parameters.name: gain

parameters.info: Flux level at which to stop cleaning. Assumed to be in Jy if units not specified.
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.info: Target flux for maximum entropy
parameters.name: targetflux

parameters.info: Deviation for maximum entropy
parameters.name: sigma

parameters.info: Keep clean model fixed
parameters.name: fixed

parameters.info: Fill MODEL_DATA column with clean model visibilities, else keeps model in memory
parameters.name: fillmodel

parameters.info: Constrain image to match target flux? For max entropy
parameters.name: constrainflux

parameters.info: Should FITS image spectral axis be velocity or frequency
parameters.name: prefervelocity

parameters.info: Name of the mask to use in cleaning
parameters.name: mask

parameters.info: Bottom left corner of mask region
parameters.name: maskblc

parameters.info: Top right corner of mask region
parameters.name: masktrc

parameters.info: Scales for multiscale clean
parameters.name: nscales

parameters.info: User-defined scales for multiscale clean. Comma separated string
parameters.name: uservector

parameters.info: Value to store in mask region; if given, mask is created; if mask not exists, defaults to 1.0
parameters.name: maskvalue

parameters.info: Simulate a FITS image into MS
parameters.name: simulate_fits

parameters.info: Predict from FITS files in chunks in the frequency axis
parameters.name: chanchunk

parameters.info: Multi-field deconvolution parameter; see casapy's imager.setmfcontrol
parameters.name: cyclefactor

parameters.info: multi-field deconvolution parameter; see casapy's imager.setmfcontrol
parameters.name: cyclespeedup

parameters.info: Multi-field deconvolution parameter; see casapy's imager.setmfcontrol
parameters.name: cyclemaxpsffraction

parameters.info: Multi-field deconvolution parameter; see casapy's imager.setmfcontrol
parameters.name: stoplargenegatives

parameters.info: Multi-field deconvolution parameter; see casapy's imager.setmfcontrol
parameters.name: stoppointmode
